EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
CYPRUS.
DNC 10.
VESSEL, SEVEN PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED AND ADRIFT
IN VICINITY 35-00.00S 035-00.00E. VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
